overview_of_class: Generalized Reynolds equation; thermal, turbulent, inertia, fluid compressibility, and surface roughness effects in sliding bearings; fatigue, scuffing, and wear in elastohydrodynamic contact; plastohydrodynamic lubrication in metal rolling, extrusion, and forging.
name: Advanced Tribology
title: MEAS MECH_ENG 446-0-1 Advanced Tribology
